translations: n.[脊椎]蟒蛇；皮毛长围巾（boa 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Boas Hallgrimsson is one of the latter.
sentences.translation: 拜斯·哈尔格利姆森便是后者之一。

sentences.sentence: Porto coach Andre Villas Boas: "Without a doubt this is a great feat."
sentences.translation: 波尔图主教练博阿斯说：“毫无疑问这是个壮举。”

sentences.sentence: And coach Andre Villas-Boas becomes the youngest man - at 33 - to win a Uefa club competition.
sentences.translation: 主教练博亚斯以33岁成为了最年轻的赢得欧洲俱乐部锦标的主教练。
